documents.document: Having co-founded two companies with skilled migrants, it's sad to see a once proud nation turning back the clock on a lifetime of progress.

IRD are pitching their $25M KM system spend as a "New Zealand company" when in fact JV between two foreign owned multinationals. WTF?

@DrCuriosity Unfortunately they seem to get a lot of airtime.
When you look at the parlous state of media generally, are "celebrities" really that qualified to be dictating moral guidance to the nation?

@nznativefish @adzebill Exactly. So why are Dairy NZ and all the other cow shit deniers winning the argument?
@ohyoufox ... only if you let it.

@farmgeek It's a great shame that our national day has become such an embarrassment. I like the idea of letting other marae host.

The @liel click-bait rant neglects one vital detail. NZ society may not be perfect but it's peaceful & socially integrated, unlike Israel.

@sulufiti Apparently the sun shines out of his messianic arse and he's @TV3nz last hope for redemption, according to some reviewers.
@deborahjcrowe I heard it was a great event. Let's make BOP the centre of collaboration ;-)
